1.2.name: wordpress/server-up
1.2.description:
Allows to show the status of a list of server as a Widget and a Shortcode. The plugin tempts to connect to a specific port on a server (defined by address, or hostname). If the connection fails, the plugin considers that the server is offline. Otherwise, the server is online.

Credits

Base on the work of jonesy44, aviable here : http://www.hawkee.com/snippet/5404/
